The Machintalk Pub-Sub Protocol provides a realiable channel for Publish-Subscribe based interfaces.
The Pub-Sub channel is unidirectional and therefore no realiable way to send message from subscriber to publisher exist. However, some transports provide notification about new subscribers starting to listen. Depending on the implementation a second channel might be necessary to request new full updates from the service.
A full value update from the service. The full update synchronizes all values and therefore marks the values as synced. Any further updates to values are pushed using the incremental update.
The incremental update message contains incremental value updates. If a incremental update is missed a new full update needs to be requested in order to get a consistent state.
